### Basic

```html
<amp-embed
  width="100"
  height="100"
  heights="(max-width:480px) 460%, (max-width:768px) 130%, (min-width: 769px) 85%, 75%"
  type="epeex"
  layout="responsive"
  data-account="demoepeex"
  data-channel="1"
>
</amp-embed>
```

## Configuration

For semantics of configuration, please contact info@epeex.com.

### Required parameters

-   `data-account`
-   `data-channel`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-htmlurl`
-   `data-ampurl`
-   `data-testmode`
